COVER_TEXT: Production of sweaters, jackets and coats for women and youth.
ABOUT_PROFILE: We specialize in producing sweaters, jackets and coats for women and youth.
ABOUT_MACHINES: We have STOLL and UNIVERSAL machines thanks to which we're able to comply in almost all knitting techniques. All our knitwears are made of high quality yarn.
ABOUT_COOPERATION: We are open to ideas and creativity of our customers. We are pleased to carry them out.
